name: Kandi's Palette
description: Separated from her family, Kandi the chameleon (short for Kandinsky) must find her way home! Fortunately for Kandi, portals can be used to avoid dangerous predators and navigate through unfriendly terrain! The catch, Kandi’s skin must match the color of the portal. Eating fruit will change Kandi’s color to match her last eaten fruit. Eat two fruit to make a new color! Assist Kandi as she uses her expertise in mixing colors, to safely join her family!
